CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 27, 1961, pg. A10 reads: "Loendi Hostesses - When the good ship Avalon floats down the beautiful Ohio, Memorial Day, for Loendi Club's gala moonlight cruise, the above group of hostesses will be on hand to add additional glamour along with those listed last week. Top row, left to right: Mira Kavaler, Kathleen Holloway, Barbara Tardy and Gay DeHall.  Bottom row in same order: Gertna Horsley, Marjorie Miller, Dorothy Mellix, Marlene Moore and Esther Ficklin.  Also serving as a hostess although not shown in the picture is Carole Velar. -Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Pauline Stotts wearing dark satin dress with pleating and bow on bodice and jacket with satin trim, seated on upholstered sofa in front of dark horizontal striped curtain
